name: Agrawal Metal Works
overview:
Established in the year 1976 we, “Agrawal Metal Works”, are an ISO 9001: 2008 and EOU organization engaged in manufacturing supplying and exporting an extensive range of Hardware Fittings. Manufactured using high-grade basic material, this range conforms with the defined parameters of the industry. Owing to its construction, this range hold several significant attributes such as longer service life, resistance against corrosion and robust construction.

Product Portfolio: We are a prominent manufacturer, supplier and exporter of an impeccable range of Hardware Fittings. Manufactured using high-grade raw material in compliance with the defined quality standards, these products are highly demanded for their superior quality, excellent performance and longer service life.

Research & Development: We are supported by a sophisticated Research & Development unit. This unit is proficiently handled by qualified and skilled researchers. Their constant research on quality as well as analysis of the products, make us to offer improvised range to our valued clients.

Our Aim: To provide 100% customer’s satisfaction through maintaining the quality of our hardware fittings and timely delivery. To design and manufacture top class quality products that are well accepted by the international customers. To expand our manufacturing abilities as well as distribution network.

Quality: Being a quality conscious and ISO 9001:2008 certified firm, we make efforts in order to provide our clients with the best-in-class Hardware Fittings. The entire production of our products is being carried out by team of professionals in line with the defined parameters of the industry.

Our Team: Procuring agents Production personnel Quality controllers Mangers Administrators
